description: This file contains shell functions related to system events (sysevent), such as facilitating remote sysevent to IPv6 addresses for AP and NP, and managing sysevent handlers including registration and unregistration.

methods.name: sysevent_np
methods.description: Facilitates remote sysevent to NP's linked local IPv6 address, intended to be called from AP.

methods.name: sysevent_ap
methods.description: Facilitates remote sysevent to AP's linked local IPv6 address, intended to be called from NP.

methods.name: register_sysevent_handler
methods.description: Registers a sysevent handler for a service and records its async id for future unregistration.

methods.name: unregister_sysevent_handler
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered sysevent handler using its saved async id.
